trans-unit.source: Contains a description of a mapped relationship between a source table and a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
This class is used by a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataAdapter"></xref> when populating a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> provides a master mapping between the data returned from a query against a data source, and a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
The <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> name can be passed in place of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> name to the `Fill` method of the **DataAdapter**.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class with a source when given a source table name and a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> name.
The case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class when given a source table name, a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> name, and an array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.
The case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
An array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
A data column mapping collection.
Gets or sets the table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> value and the name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists, it is returned.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur:
MissingMappingAction
Action taken
Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.
An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.
Gets a null value.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
A data column.
The mappingAction parameter was set to `Error`, and no mapping was specified.
Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object for a given column name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
The data type for sourceColumn.
The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object.
Gets the current <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> value.
If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> does not exist, the specified <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> is taken.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> from which to get the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
A data table.
Gets or sets the case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
The case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
Converts the current <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.SourceTable"></xref> name to a string.
The current <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.SourceTable"></xref> name, as a string.
Gets the derived <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.ColumnMappings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A data column mapping collection.
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.ICloneable.Clone%2A>.
A new object that is a copy of the current instance.
